DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate growth healthy term infant feed experimental infant formula prebiotic , commercial control infant formula probiotic , without prebiotic human breast milk
DOC.brief_title: Growth Infants Fed New Term Infant Formula
DOC.detailed_description: Multisite , double-blind , randomize , control clinical trial . The purpose study determine infant feed standard infant formula prebiotic weight gain line infant feed standard starter infant formula without prebiotic .

At enrollment , birth weight ≥ 2500g ≤ 4500g . 9 . For formulafed group , infant parent ( ) /LAR previously make decision formula feed infant time enrollment . 1 .
